text: In mathematics and physics, non-Archimedean refers to something without the Archimedean property. This includes: * Ultrametric space ** notably, p-adic numbers * Non-Archimedean ordered field, namely: ** Levi-Civita field ** Hyperreal numbers ** Surreal numbers ** Dehn planes * In theoretical physics, Non-Archimedean time == See also == * Absolute value (algebra)
title: Non-Archimedean
